overview: Love and sex are two different things. But if they club together in a person the motives may go beyond imagination. Ekta has got that motive, and what could Sheetal do for Ekta? Sheetal loves Ekta but Ekta loves her to the dire consequences. Watch JUNOON-E-ISHQ a heart throbbing story of unparalleled love, hatred and revenge.
title: Junoon e Ishq
